item.title: Defer in Golang
item.description: The defer keyword is found in many modern programming languages, and Go’s defer executes the passed-in function before the current function or method returns. It is often used to close file descriptors, close database connections, and unlock resources.

item.title: A better way to implement getMax() in Golang
item.description:
In previous assignment, I was asked to implement a function which can pick the biggest number in a slice.

By learning on Coursera, I found a better way to do this.

item.title: Solutions for Pasting Codes
item.description: The article shows several ways to elegantly share source code
